item.title: By: SQLDenis

item.description: Are you saying that you don't run everything as <em>sa</em> with a <em>''</em> password...what happened...burned by <em>SQL Slammer</em>?
item.content:encoded: Are you saying that you don’t run everything as sa with a ” password…what happened…burned by SQL Slammer?
